AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: berserker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Skilled with what ever weapon [PAWN_pronoun] could get [PAWN_possessive] hands on, as long as it wasn't a bow, [PAWN_nameDef] was a fearsome sight on the battlefield. Though [PAWN_pronoun] did have a tendency to ignore any potentially life-threatening wounds acquired during battle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: great warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One of the most skilled warriors in [PAWN_possessive] stronghold, [PAWN_nameDef] over time grew tired of dealing with foes that offered little threat. So [PAWN_pronoun] set out into the world in search of a legendary fight, or an honourable death.
